subject: Web3
title: Multi-Currency Stablecoins
description: Learn Multi-Currency Stablecoins in one minute.

hook.text: Most stablecoins track the dollar. New projects are creating stablecoins for euros, yen, and emerging market currencies.

buildup.text: Circle's EURC tracks the euro. Other projects target the Brazilian real, Indian rupee, and Nigerian naira.

discovery.text: Multi-currency stablecoins could enable instant forex trading. Swap from digital euros to digital yen in seconds.

twist.text: Emerging market currency stablecoins face resistance from local governments who fear losing monetary control.

climax.text: A world of multi-currency stablecoins could make foreign exchange faster, cheaper, and accessible to everyone.

punchline.text: Every currency on every blockchain. Simple vision, complex politics.

quiz.question: Why might governments resist local currency stablecoins?
options: Governments fear losing control over monetary policy
